coreAttributes.name: herm glyph barbell
coreAttributes.description: A slightly curved bar with a metallic sphere on one end and a freely-moving hinged icon of a hermaphroditic glyph on the other. Its design is such that it would be possible to comfortably fit it into either a navel piercing or a 'clitoral hood' or 'Christina' vaginal piercing.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the ringed barbell into [npc.her] navel piercing.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the ringed barbell into [npc2.namePos] navel piercing.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(slide)] the ringed barbell into [npc2.namePos] navel piercing.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] ringed barbell out of [npc.her] navel piercing.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] ringed barbell out of [npc2.her] navel piercing.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] ringed barbell out of [npc2.her] navel piercing.
